title: Can you spot 12 Welsh sports stars who made headlines in 2025?
summary: They are all elite Welsh sports stars and they all hit the headlines in 2025 - but with festive baubles in the way, how many of our Christmas dozen can you spot?

title: Take on our BBC Gameshows ultimate football quiz
summary: We've built five quizzes to celebrate five BBC shows - but only those with the biggest football trivia brains can beat them all.

title: 'Dropped on Christmas Day and redemption in Durban'
summary: Steven Finn looks back on a career of touring with England, including the low of being dropped on Christmas Day and the high of taking down South Africa.
